properties.headline: Hydrologic Outlook issued January 14 at 8:43AM CST by NWS Lincoln IL
properties.description:
This hydrologic outlook includes the following river in Illinois:

Sangamon River...

The following river information is based on future predicted
rainfall. The exact amount, intensity, timing, and location of the
rain that will occur is still uncertain. These outlook stages are
provided to show what may be expected if the forecast precipitation
occurs. Once there is more certainty about the river forecasts, a
flood warning or statement will be issued if the threat materializes.

For the Sangamon River at Petersburg...the latest stage is 20.5 feet
at 8 AM Tuesday. Flood stage is 23.0 feet. Minor flooding is
forecast...with a crest of 23.1 feet early Thursday morning...which
is 0.1 feet above flood stage. The river should rise above the flood
stage of 23.0 feet tomorrow evening. The river should fall below
flood stage early Friday morning. At 23.0 feet...Extensive
agricultural and lowland flooding occurs.
